00034 class EditorItemNode {
00035     public:
00036         enum ItemType {
00037             DefaultTextFormattingIe,
00038             ParagraphItem,
00039             TextItem,
00040             AtomicItem,
00041             InvalidItem
00042         };
00043 
00044         EditorItemNode();
00045         ~EditorItemNode(); // not virual !!
00046         
00047         void SetItemType(ItemType type) { m_type = type; }
00048         ItemType GetItemType() const { return m_type; }
00049         void SetPosition(INT pos) { m_pos = pos; }
00050         INT GetPosition () const { return m_pos; }
00051         void SetLength(INT length) { m_length = length; }
00052         INT GetLength() const { return m_length; }
00053         void SetCompoundItem(CompoundItem* item);
00054         CompoundItem* GetCompoundItem();
00055         void SetEditorItem(AtomItem* item);
00056         AtomItem* GetEditorItem();
00057         void SetTextFormatting(UINT8 mode, UINT8 colour);
00058         InformationElement GetTextFormattingElement();
00059         
00060     private:
00061         enum UnionType {
00062             CompoundItemType,
00063             EditorItemType,
00064             TextFormattingType,
00065             InvalidType
00066         };
00067 
00068         ItemType    m_type;
00069         UnionType   m_union_type;
00070         INT         m_pos;
00071         INT         m_length;
00072         union {
00073             CompoundItem*   m_compound_item;
00074             AtomItem*       m_editor_item;
00075             UINT16          m_text_formatting;
00076         };
00077 };
